Reviews.Title: Best little and cheap digital camera
Reviews.Author: Joao A. Kouyoumdjian
Reviews.Content: Excelent pictures. Multiple face detection. Smile detection (fantastic). Good resolution on movies. Powerful flash. 4x3 and 16x9 pictures. Full HD 1080 prepared.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Alvarado "copan1400"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  It's easy to use, it takes nice pictures and it's small enough to carry it in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Jodi Herrling "Country girl"
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for! I have yet to find 1 thing I do not like about this camera, which is very rare. I recommend this to any and everyone who wants an easy to use snap shot camera. I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Good for Children
Reviews.Author: Helen Woideck
Reviews.Content: We bought the camera instead of buying a childs camera. Childrens cameras get bad reviews. We set the camera up for point and shoot for a five year old. Downloading isn't a problem either. It is too early for Photoshop.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Virginia V.
Reviews.Content: The packing was just right and came quickly. I have had this camera for many years now. It works as well as the day I bought it. I am very happy with this camera, which came with all the accessories as pictured.

Reviews.Title: Great cute camera
Reviews.Author: Renata Freire
Reviews.Content: This camera made me happy for so long time!It's small and cute! Take great pictures. I recomend for girls!

Reviews.Title: great camera, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Just Grace
Reviews.Content: haven't been disappointed with this camera.  Good clear pics each and every time.  Does nice video as well.  So important for capturing the memories with family

Reviews.Title: Arrived quickly
Reviews.Author: Aimee1134
Reviews.Content: This has a decent battery life and takes good pictures. Plus it is a very girly pink.  My 11 yo daughter loved it.

Reviews.Title: It's kinda ok
Reviews.Author: Charles E. Schwartz "Tubemann"
Reviews.Content: It works sort of, but if I had it to do over would opt for something else. Some times the pictures turn out pretty good & other times not so good.

Reviews.Title: arrived broken and inoperable
Reviews.Author: Emily Shaw
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera before and loved it, but mine has suffered a hard life. I thought I would purchase a used model on Amazon, but it arrived broken and inoperable. That is completely inexcusable from a seller.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lady M
Reviews.Content: I had one prior to this, but it was dropped and couldn't be repaired.  I love it because it has an actual viewfinder, which doesn't exist on any of the newer models, or any comparative cameras from other companies today.  The quality of the pictures is terrific. I will never understand the current need for more and more megapixels on a camera. The camera arrived in better condition than I expected.  Thank you, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Joyce Bazan
Reviews.Content: This was a present for a family member who already had this same camera. She has used it for years and would never want to be without it. Although she has no problems with the one she owned, we bought it as a backup. She can also use the same cords, etc. and not have to replace them. She never leaves home without her camera and is a real camera bug.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Q "Q"
Reviews.Content: This product is perfect for what it can do and for the price.  This is why I gave it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Sony Cybershot Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas D. Parsons "Be Prepared"
Reviews.Content: Sony Cybershot is a great camera.  Small and easy to use.  Had one stolen out of my car at a carwash and had to find another to replace it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Trikerjon
Reviews.Content: This is the second DSCW120 camera that we bought. The first one took great pictures and worked great with no problems. It also has a viewfinder which most new cameras don`t have, but I find is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot DCS W120
Reviews.Author: Ellen H Hofer
Reviews.Content: This is such a great little camera that when I lost mine last week, I bought another one just like it.  One of the best features is that is has a real viewfinder instead of just the viewing screen on the back, like most digital cameras out there now.On a trip to Alaska we used it for movies of the trip and they came out beautifully.It is very easy to upload to a computer to share with others and to hook up to your TV for viewing. The picture quality is great even for larger prints.There was a very short learning curve since it is so easy to use. I would definitely recommend this camera and was very happy to find there were still some around on Amazon since Sony doesn't make them anymore.

Reviews.Title: Very, very good
Reviews.Author: Yonis Santos Diaz "drcaribe"
Reviews.Content: It's a good camera for my needs, the best image, excellent shape and thin, need no more than this one

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Freddiecat
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace our 10-year-old 3.2 MP camera that is still taking good pictures, but is too big to carry easily. I was looking for something much more portable with an updated mega pixel capability. This camera is perfectly sized and easy to use, but unfortunately takes undependable pictures.  Some photos are in focus and others blurry for no apparent reason. This happens with pictures taken right in row of the same subject with the same settings. Indoor, outdoor, sunlight, lamplight all hit and miss. Tried a multitude of different settings with no improvement. The most frustrating part is that the pictures usually look fine on the viewing screen, so it's not until they're downloaded that you realize the shot is blurry. I missed numerous once-in-a-lifetime photos on a trip this summer because they looked fine when reviewed on screen but blurry when downloaded. Admittedly, the shots that do turn out have good color...It's possible that I'm just not "getting" this camera. Maybe I'm not doing something right(and yes, I know to partially press the shutter button to focus before taking the shot); however, I haven't had this problem with our earlier cameras, my sister's camera, the camera at work, etc.  After months of experimenting I decided "it's not me, it's you," and I moved on to a new relationship with a Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS3 that I am completely in love with.Pros:-portable size-easy to navigate-good photo colors-sturdy (Our pony BIT the camera.  The camera was in its case, but I had to pull it free from her teeth and there were grinding noises involved.  The blurriness problem was present before this occurred, and was no worse afterward.)Cons:-Approximately half the pictures are unusable due to blurring.Conclusion: All the "pro's" in the world don't make up for pictures you can't use.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: uglyluggage
Reviews.Content: great point and shoot. I think It has attached itself to my wifes hand. We have tons and tons of shots.

Reviews.Title: Rather easy to use, Poor Construction!!!
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I received a Sony, Cyber-shot DSC-W120, May 2008, to replace my aging Kodak.  Instantly I was thrilled!  I soon came to discover that NOTHING from my former Kodak digital camera was compatible with my new camera.  I broke down and purchased a second battery and a memory card.  The battery that came with the camera was rechargeable and seemed to have great life!  The camera uses a "stick" style memory card, not an SD.  Because of this, I needed to make certain not to lose track of the cord that comes with the camera allowing you to load pictures into your computer, purchase a special memory card converter or take to a place that will put pictures from "stick" onto CD.The camera has a weak zoom motor.  Any small drop or jar can cause the gears inside to become stuck or 'derailed.'  This IS covered by Sony Warranty (only three months for most models).  Getting this issue repaired involves spending at least 30 minutes on the phone struggling with Sony Tech Support.  Once an agreement (either that the issue IS or IS NOT covered by warranty or payment is worked out) is agreed upon you must send your camera in.  This process took over 3 weeks each time.  The lack of camera during this time proved to be a MAJOR inconvenience for me.The camera has a nice display screen on the back of the camera.  Pictures show up nice and clear!  However, this screen is VERY easily scratched!  Enough scratches on this screen and viewing pictures or navigating through the menu become difficult.On a different note, the features are easy to use!  I am not fond of the ISO setting.  Pictures taken with that setting are VERY grainy!  With all the other settings the pictures are VERY nice for the price of the camera!I would NOT get this camera again, and do NOT recommend this camera to ANYONE who is planning on using this camera other than for a paper weight!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joshmax
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pics, easy to carry around.One complain, you can't use any card or charger except Sony's.

Reviews.Title: Constant problem with the lens barrel assembly
Reviews.Author: Charles E. Carlson "Sengekontacket"
Reviews.Content: I am a SONY fan and bought this camera in 2008 before a trip to Russia and Germany.  The lens barrel assembly failed after two months of use.  I happened to have a second camera with me.  Sony quickly repaired the camera in the US and would have replaced it in Berlin if I had sale information. It failed again in November, 2009.  Same problem.  After using the camera normally for a few shots, the assembly goes in and out when the power button is pushed.  It does not remain out of the case and the camera cannot be used and remains inoperable. Luckily I bought an extended maintenance package and hopefully the camera will be replaced.  My camera is an unreliable instrument.  This is my first bad SONY product.  Saying all of this, I have been pleased with the camera and have taken professional quality pictures.  The scene selections work well, but it pays off to read the manual.

Reviews.Title: I like this camera
Reviews.Author: Ehab M. Ammar
Reviews.Content: I bought this item recently and I really like it. Everything works fine, the only issue is that when you use the optical zoom to its maximum you feel like the picture is grained (not the expected quality). In fact, beyond 3x optical zooming quality is compromised.Also take care that you will have to buy a special card, Pro Duo Mark 2 but this is not a big deal.All in all I do like and recommend it, it is a great purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Small, lightweight, stylish, well made and shoots a great picture
Reviews.Author: Cute Chihuahua
Reviews.Content: This camera shoots an awesome picture and it's small, stylish and lightweight. It seems to be made very well and I have no complaints about it whatsoever. We have used this camera for about six months now and I don't think it has ever taken a bad picture. It will take a great picture and it will also record video with sound. It has all the bells and whistles like red eye reduction, still shot and special effects. I think it's well worth the money.Width: 3.6 inchesHeight: 2.3 inchesWeight: 4.4 ozResolution: 7.2 megapixelsDigital Zoom: 2xMemory: 15MB built in flash memory (expandable with memory stick duo)

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Debit Card "B.B.S"
Reviews.Content: WELL, I BOUGHT IT BECAUSE MY KODAK ONE BROKE. SO WHEN I SAW THIS ONE PERFECT FOR ME, IT'S PINK  AND SONY IS AN EXCELLENT NAME BRAND. I BROUGHT IT AS USED AND LOOK LIKE NEW. EVERYTHING IS IN GREAT SHAPE  SO  I RECOMMENDED AS A GIFT THEY WILL  FALL  IN LOVE WITH IT.

Reviews.Title: Handy Little Gem
Reviews.Author: P. G. Swank "theredqueen"
Reviews.Content: It's small, it's easy to use, the battery is rechargeable, the pictures are great.  What more could you want?  There are all the features you'd expect from a moderately priced camera, and if you don't want to use the features, it's easy to ignore them.  No problem with battery life, or inserting or removing the memory stick.  It fits in my purse, so I'm likely to have it along when I need it.  The instruction manual is even easy to use.  And it has good Sony optics.  Great camera!

Reviews.Title: All good features
Reviews.Author: O. YOUNIS
Reviews.Content: Very good quality pictures and very easy to use. Also came in fast after ordering from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: worse than average
Reviews.Author: PS "PS"
Reviews.Content: It makes decent pictures in daylight but the night shots and the shots make in artificial light this camera cannot handle at all. Also the battery severely handicaps the performance of this camera, it is extremely weak and you will surely miss all your good shots if you need to make them quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah "photographylover"
Reviews.Content: I love this Camera, but it's zoom is.... less than expected.  This camera has many features, but my family also has a Kodak Z812, and I prefer that camera.This camera is perfect for talking pictures of family and friends on a trip or just to carry around in a bag or something like that, but I am more interested in photography, and I bought this camera to have my own pictures on my own camera, but this camera doesn't really work for that.  It does have one feature that the Kodak doesn't have and it has the ability to turn off autofocus.  I really like this, because sometimes, when taking up close shots, the camera autofocuses on the farther object, not the object i want it to.Anyways, this is a very good camera.  If you are looking for a camera for photography, check out the Kodak Z1012, or so, they are fairly inexpensive, and are great cameras, but if this is a camera for personal pictures of family and friends, then this is a great camera you should definitely consider buying.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Vibin Koshy
Reviews.Content: I purchased it a year ago and its working perfect. A little slow in between taking pictures other than that i have not seen any negatives to this product.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for mom
Reviews.Author: Bob in Syracuse
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a birthday gift for mom, along with the Sony MSMT4G memory stick and the Sony LCS-CST soft case to protect it.  She loves it.  Easy to use, great pictures, and good looks.

Reviews.Title: Buy this camara!
Reviews.Author: kamgrn
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT little camera! I have had it for about a year now and I carry it with me everywhere.  It is cute and fits in my purse.  Light enuf to carry on my wrist.  The pictures snap quick.  Great focus.  NO BLUR!  Excellent action shots.  Crisp & clean.  Great pics in dim light too!  Nice movie feature.  I would not trade this camera for anything.  I have not a single complaint and I hope it lasts FOREVER!  Oh and i dropped it this weekend ... dropped it HARD on a concrete floor .. barely a knick in it and no issues.

Reviews.Title: Why the price jump?
Reviews.Author: S. Blackmon "kuntrygurl"
Reviews.Content: I  bought this camera as a christmas gift and my cousin loves it.  I guess I should have bought myself one hack then as well.  Back then, it was only $109-119.  Why has the price DOUBLED??!?!??performance of the camera = *****price of the camera = *

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: pookle
Reviews.Content: Specifically wanted a camera that would 1) fit in my pocket 2)have image stabilization 3) could take pictures, movies in a darkened environment.Could not be happier with the Sony Cybershot DSCW120!  My intent was to take the camera to a concert, and (hopefully) get pictures with the band. So, concealment (pocketsized) was an issue, as was blurring and dark environment.  Pictures were a complete success.  And the camera itself is extremely easy to use- point and shoot settings.  So easy, even a lead singer can use it (to take my picture with the drummer).Another fun feature is the smile shutter.  In this setting, a picture is automatically taken when a subject smiles.  Video quality is great (again, mainly used in concert setting), and battery lasts a long time, and is easily recharged.I would completely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a little less than a year and it's the best camera i've had ... hands down! I've had HP cameras before and there's NO comparison Great pictures, fast and easy download to computer, great zoom, good video! You can even use it to transfer data from one computer to another (like a memory stick)...

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with camera
Reviews.Author: L. L. B.
Reviews.Content: As much as I'd like to be a talented photographer, I have collected cameras that are too much work to learn how to use and require more expertise than I'm willing to invest.  This camera is easy to use, takes great pictures, is compact, and is a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Chase Norris
Reviews.Content: Came with the media card CASE, but no media card. I can only take 5 pics without one :/

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: I. Barker
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my girlfriend for her birthday and she loved it! (pink is a winner) Easy to use, good photo quality, and not a single complaint.  Nice job Sony.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!
Reviews.Author: OS No. 11
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my girlfriend.  She absolutley loves it.  With all the features, picture clarity, videos capabilities and such...well, she literally take the camera everywhere she goes.  For the price I paid through Amazon, it was a steal!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: F. Seraj
Reviews.Content: This camera is compact and so easy to use. It takes great pictures in all kinds of settings and the macro feature is awesome.The only shortfall is it lacks date/time stamp but you can accomplish this with the software.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot Review
Reviews.Author: Diana C. Iwanowski "Diana Christine"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and it was a great value to purchase. There are a ton of preset picture-taking settings which makes it easy to shoot great pictures for any non-photographer. It is also very easy to upload the pictures to your computer or TV.

Reviews.Title: Not so Great
Reviews.Author: ScruffyTJ
Reviews.Content: I do not enjoy this camera. I bought it because my husbands family swears by Sony.  My old Canon was 100 times better than this.  It takes horrible photos inside, and I never feel like I have the nice and sharp pictures that I am looking for.  Many colors also blur in pictures. I would not recommend this camera.  Go for a Canon!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!!
Reviews.Author: Susanne Dipilato
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after our fujifilm finepix e510 died on us. We wanted something that something that was just as good as taking pictures but something that wouldent be crazy expensive. This camera is a steal at such a low price. We got a 4gb memory stick and you can take over 1100 pictures even on the highest quality.The camera itself is very good looking and very sleek. It also doesnt feel cheap(plasticey) and feels very sturdy. The buttons are easy to get to and the screen is clear and bright. Battery life is also very good. The battery does take a long time to charge but it really is more of an overnight charger.The pictures on this camera for the most part come out great. Pictures outside and in good light should give you very clear pictures. The macro feature also works with well with close up shots. Picures in the dark come out good as well although some in very low light do come out a little grainy and some have a little color bleeding if thats the right word for it, nothing too major just not something that youd want to blow up really big. There is extensive adjustments you can make to help this. Also you can take a shot with flash and one without to see what comes out better. Video on this camera in the highest setting comes out suprisingly good. The flash on this camera is also conveinent and it taked 2 seconds recharge the flash. You can also adjust the brightness of the flash which i though was amazing. Amazon shipping was fast and the package arrived with no damage at all. If you are looking for a cheap quick camera this is the one. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Tiburcio "Carlos"
Reviews.Content: I think it is an excellent camera for it's cost.Great picture size, easy to use, long battery life.What else could you want for that price?!

Reviews.Title: every thing is perfect
Reviews.Author: Frank Leon
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this camera. It can take high quality photos and HD movies. The seller also shiped it very fast (with fedex). The camera came with exerlant condition.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: olivia tannebaum "ewan fan"
Reviews.Content: I really love the size and color of this camera. It has so many options that aren't too difficult to get the hang of. The pictures come out excellent.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in pink
Reviews.Author: Alan Maberry
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as a B-Day present for my wife, a woman who absolutely can not be bothered with reading instruction manuals or tinkering around with settings. Therefor a good point & shoot was definitely in order. It also had to look good and fit in her purse. Well, the SONY DSC-W120 provided all of that and some! The quality of the camera is excellent and the 'pink rose' color is quite pretty...not the childish look of a lot of other brands offering it in pink. I set up the basics for her, showed her the AUTO and EASY modes and she's off and running taking beautiful pictures! I looked at and read reviews on many different cameras before settling on this one. The features, quality and looks of this SONY could not, IMHO, be beat! She and I are quite happy with this camera. The ONLY reason I don't give it five stars is the outlandish prices SONY wants for any and all of their accesories, to include their memory sticks !!! SONY needs to come off of their high horse on that issue !

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: N. Wong
Reviews.Content: I bought this from Sears last summer, and it satisfies me, but not enough to recommend it to a friend / give a 5 star review.This camera doesn't come with those USB cords you can find in the store [4pin / 5pin] This camera has a specific USB cord you can ONLY get if you buy the whole camera again! So if you lose it, you'll have to get a card reader! =(The camera focus is great, but not far from excellent.Not enough focus and lighting.When recording a video, it will be interrupted when you accidentally rotate from the VIDEO symbol to any CAMERA symbol, which is frustrating, especially because mine isn't that old, yet rotates too easily.When transitioning from picture taking to photos, it's a tad slow, and for power users like me who like to do things fast and catch last-second moments on the camera, this is not the digital camera to do so.Tends to slow down at random moments.Overall, i give this a 3, because it could be made much more efficiently, and i wouldn't recommend this to a friend/family.I plan to get this :http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/B001VMDOE0/ref=ord_cart_shr?_encoding=UTF8&m;=A3SPLR0MSOYZ8O&v;=glanceBecause it comes with everything, instead of just the camera, and because it's 10.2 MP.But for the Sony Cybershot DSCW120 7.2MP, it does the job for it's price.

Reviews.Title: so happy I purchased this camera
Reviews.Author: diamond in the rough "always pretty"
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera even though I haven't taken many pictures with it yet this is my first digital camera and I would say so far taking a picture is easy and they came out well when I learn to use the many features that come with it I am quite sure there are lots of things I will be able to do with a picture  also delivery was quick

Reviews.Title: I'm Very HAPPY!!!
Reviews.Author: Ronald Minaya
Reviews.Content: It is a super comfortable camera, its compact size make easier to use and  carry without occupying a great space, Its functions are brilliant specially its 4x zoom lens and the Smile Shutter is fantastic and another great things is the capacity of memory we can expand using a Memory Stick Duo / Duo Pro  up to 16GB.This is the best buy I've ever done until now

Reviews.Title: good camera.bad battery
Reviews.Author: Francoise hommeril "mamouchka"
Reviews.Content: the camera gives very good pictures,can be easy to use but the battery may be too old,it  needs to be charged very often even if you spare it,so buy another battery if you are travelling.Francoise Hommeril

Reviews.Title: Ten Year Old Loves it!
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Merritt "Old Salt"
Reviews.Content: Just about every feature has been tried and no complaints were heard.  She takes it every where.  Cameras can be purchased for less dollars but the extra features make it an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: S. Carey
Reviews.Content: So far my family loves this camera, but we always love any new gadget, so I'm giving it a 4... Clear pictures, great video (see didn't even bother taking the flipvideo out of the bag), and easy to download, though waiting for something less bulky than the proprietary wires that come with the the camera. OH, make sure you buy a memory card as it does not come with one!

Reviews.Title: no regrets
Reviews.Author: S. Sherwood
Reviews.Content: This camera was recommended to me by a friend, I was afraid to buy it at first because I dont have such good luck with buying cameras in the past... but what a difference this camera is. It takes really great pictures day and night, in dark places... I guarantee u wont have any regrets buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: good for price
Reviews.Author: Anggie L.
Reviews.Content: it takes good pics if you take care of pre hold shot button otherwise some pics get blur.exelent for sun pics but not good resolution with zoom.smile shoter is nice but not alwayscase good and memory stick good.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great!
Reviews.Author: K. Wilson
Reviews.Content: The camera was a gift for our daughter and she loves it.  The unfortunate part is there was supposed to be a kit with the camera including a case, strap and a table-top tripod which did not arrive.  As we purchased this gift for her trip abroad, the free accessory kit was one reason we chose this particular camera.  Have had no luck in receiving the accessory kit to date.  This is certainly not to take away from the camera itself, as she is extremely pleased with it's performance.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: M. Drenth "Tool guy"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and serves purpose for my needs.  I bought a Pink one as it was $40 cheaeper than other cameras, but the same camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice results and good praise, except...
Reviews.Author: mariehr64
Reviews.Content: A holiday gift for my niece. She loves it a takes great shots. Crisp and everything and more than you'd expect from a $100 camera. We all noted that if you weren't really still there might be a blur. That's the shooters fault - but kids are hard to keep still. Good value and I think/hope it will give her three years of use till she gets to high school. 4 Star

Reviews.Title: Best budget Camera with HD support
Reviews.Author: Satish Uppada "Satish U"
Reviews.Content: I never expected those many features that this camera provides at such a nominal price. Its so easy to setup and I have connected the same to an HDTV with very ease. Also its 4x zoom is plus as some of the other cameras within the same price range hardly comes at 3x optical zoom. Go for it , first for its price , then its features and last but not the least, its SONY!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Hopkins
Reviews.Content: I love this camera..... It is so much more than I expected it to be and that is awesome! Being a new mom it is important to capture all of the sweet moments that happen with the new little one and this camera definitely does that and the quality is amazing!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Elak Swindell "Movie Addict"
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to restate how good this camera is since the top three reviews prove that already.  But, I did have to chime in on one slight problem you will need to watch for after purchase.  When in the "Twilight" mode, which literally allows you to make great shots with a flash in a pitch black room or area, you MUST use a tripod.  On this setting, the camera becomes extremely sensitive to movement from your hand.  Even the pulse from your finger.  If there is a light source within the view, it will streak oddly, leaving you wondering "How did that happen?  It's cool, but how?"  Using a tripod keeps this problem from happening.  I took a picture of the corner of my bedroom the other night (in total darkness), after I got the camera, and the LED numbers from my clock streaked up in a line toward the ceiling.  Everything else in the shot was fine, just the illumination of the LEDs was affected.  Other than this small imperfection, this camera is a must-have.

Reviews.Title: Lovable!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sarai "Claudia"
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love my pink camara!!!  It's very small, so its easy to just carry it around... Would absolutely recommend others to buy this...

Reviews.Title: Extremely good
Reviews.Author: Sriswapna Chodagam "Swapna"
Reviews.Content: This is extremely good camera for the price it was sold.Picture Clarity is very good and have excellent features

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Karl Miller "amateur photographer"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my Mom for Christmas and she loves it. She is new to digital photography and has difficulty with new electronic gadgets sometimes. She has no trouble taking beautiful pictures with this camera. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a small but high quality point and shoot digital camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Zoraida
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my sister and she is very happy with all the functions.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Nelson
Reviews.Content: We got the camera in 2 days from J&R;, and we like it! It does what we want: it takes good pictures. Plus, it looks good. It has a lot of features that we haven't used yet, but that's one thing that's good about it. If we want to learn more, we can. But we don't have to know much to point, shoot, and transfer to the computer.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: S. Yalei "washai.."
Reviews.Content: It arrived just one day before my Florida trip! I brought it to FL, and I took lots of excellent picture~ I like it! And my friends like it too!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: muumol
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty happy with this camera.  I haven't really had a change to see what outdoor shots look like but the low light option looks amazing.  I keep my house rather dim, and my previous cybershot did terrible in low light settings.  The zoom feature is nice to use as long as its a photo you have already taken.  If you zoom then take a photo, it comes out looking grainy at times.  I do love that I can use my memory card reader and hook it up to my PS3 and view my photos with ease, and they look absolutely AMAZING!!!!

Reviews.Title: Solid and easy to carry
Reviews.Author: SpoonerStreet "Spoon"
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera because my old Sony point and shoot was a little too bulky to carry in my pocket.  This one is nice and thin, and takes pretty good pictures too.The battery life is great as well.  I would recommend an extra battery for it, but the pics are sharp and clear.  My only complaint is that it didn't come with a wrist strap.  That would have been nice.  I also wish that it had a "sports" mode with a high shutter speed, but I didn't buy this camera to take the important sports pics.  The video mode is decent, but make sure you have it on "Fine" mode for the best quality videos. They take up more space, but you will wish you had the higher quality down the road.Overall, a great pocket camera to take with you and capture life as it happens.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: Brown Eyes "nunusmom"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my daughter and she loves it.  Easy to use, pics are great.  Excellent quality and fit our price range.

Reviews.Title: My first online purchase!
Reviews.Author: Williams Placid
Reviews.Content: Thanks for amazon in afford me to online purchase!The camera arrive me excelent conditions, everything complete!I'll come back to buy in amazon online! I Hope to get good offer!Thanks,Best regards,Williams Placid58 212 2050847Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: D. Rangaswamy
Reviews.Content: Product is great.I was kind of  not satisfied with the shipping. It took a bit longer than expected.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Camera
Reviews.Author: Gelvin Reyes
Reviews.Content: This is an excelent camera, nice quality photos with the steady shot (no more moved photos) :), really good autofocus, small size.I recomend it.

Reviews.Title: clear high quality
Reviews.Author: Mr Big "Tech Wizard"
Reviews.Content: This camera products clear shots and is easy to use. I have had others and this one is high performance and high quality

Reviews.Title: NIce camera
Reviews.Author: Wojciech Figas
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. For this price range one of the best. Easy to use and taking very good quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Just as promised.
Reviews.Author: Pamela A. Bresnen
Reviews.Content: Product was delivered as promised.  The camera is compact which is exactly what we wanted.  Just don't forget to buy yourself a memory card like i did :P

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Clown teacher "Bubbles"
Reviews.Content: I received this for a gift.  I had an older, similar model and wasn't thrilled about getting it again. WELL the improvements are AMAZING!!!!  I love that you point the camera on a subject and it makes sure the picture is centered.  It is small and compact and the picture quality is the best.  It is easy to download the pictures on my computer and share them with all of my friends.  I love the color too.  Sony is the best.

Reviews.Title: My Teen Daughters Love it!
Reviews.Author: D. Nowicki
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for taking action shots. We love that you can also take videos with it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Carlton D. Walling
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price. Very crisp pictures. Easy to use. Just point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - no regrets
Reviews.Author: P. C. Harris "cpep"
Reviews.Content: So far so good with this camera, especially for what I paid for it. The pics are clear and I love the sleekness of it and its relatively small size.

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves her camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Johns "Laura"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my daughter for Christmas. I had checked all the sale ads in my area and lots of sites online and this was the best price. It also came very quickly and was exactly what she wanted.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality!
Reviews.Author: Graeme Mc Clean "GBM"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the photos that I can take with this camera.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!
Reviews.Author: J. Brodfuehrer
Reviews.Content: So far i love this camera!  The pink color is perfect!  The picture quality is amazing and incredibly crisp.  The feature that takes a picture once you smile is creative and useful.  The camera comes with features that let you shoot in black and white, sepia, and vivid colors which i love. I only have three tiny factors that i would change about the camera. Keep in mind that I am a 16 year old girl who is not incredibly smart when it comes to electronics, so there may be some way to fix my problems i have just not figured it out yet.  One problem is that it does not let you zoom in or out while you are recording a video.  Another problem is that it does not let you delete a picture in the camera mode as soon as you take it.  Instead, you have to go to the mode that shows the pictures.  The other problem i have with it is that when you are going through your taken pictures, at first they are blurry.  After a split second they sharpen to their normal form (I'm pretty sure this is true for all cameras though).

Reviews.Title: Sony cybershot W120
Reviews.Author: nich
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony Cybershot s650 and it was the worst, I had it for five days and used it for two before the screen stop working sony needs to take that model off the market so i decided to get another, after looking around there was no other brand that i like, so i got a Sony Cybershot w120 and i must say that it is much better.everything is good with this oneI really like it!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Carolina Felix
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent digital camera. You can see it right into your TV, is very good.

Reviews.Title: Sony cybershot
Reviews.Author: movie buff "movie buff"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera; it has a big screen on the back,very compact, and takes great pics at night.  Love the fact that it doesn't use batteries too

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Abby Peoples
Reviews.Content: This is my second cyber shot and it's great. It is very easy to use and it takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera Review
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: This camera seems neat especially for the price, but I cannot believe that it does not have auto redeye reduction........

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this camera!!
Reviews.Author: P. Ulrich
Reviews.Content: Thankfully, we got the camera just before Christmas!  We have so many great pics!  It is very easy to use, each setting is described on the screen so you don't have to rely on your memory for what each icon means.  It also has  a slideshow feature that plays a few different songs or download your own.  We love it and are glad to have found it for 40 dollars less on Amazon than in stores, including the sony site.

Reviews.Title: So far so great!
Reviews.Author: The Mailman
Reviews.Content: Thus far the CyberShot has been a great purchase.  We bought it for our daughter for Christmas, and we love it's ease of use right out of the box, the various functions it offers, and the high quality photos and videos.  We were disappointed with the lack of a memory storage card (had to buy one separately after the fact), and you also have to beware of shutter lag with point and shoot digital cameras, such as this CyberShot.  Other than that, as mentioned, a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, great pics, easy to use
Reviews.Author: G. Zook
Reviews.Content: I was specifically looking for a camera for my wife that was very easy to use.  She has figured this out pretty quickly.  When I wanted to set some advance features such as red-eye reduction and centering on the faces, I found it to take seconds to learn the interface.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot W120
Reviews.Author: Samantha M. Perouty "Wife and Mom"
Reviews.Content: I just upgraded from the Sony Cyber Shot S60.  The pros of this camera are the price, compact size, color selection, and smile shutter feature.  The Cons of this camera are there is no trimming or cropping feature, which I use all the time, it uses a Sony battery instead of AA batteries, and it uses a Memory Stick Pro Duo.  Honestly, I like my old one better, but I will get used to this one.  This is a good point and shoot camera for a teenager or a beginner, I'm just missing my old Sony!

Reviews.Title: So tiny, cute, and PINK!
Reviews.Author: Catherine L. Koosmann "Cathie"
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I wanted. I wanted something I could put in my hand bag and have when I wanted it. This is a super quality camera. Nice big viewing screen, and very easy to operate. Do remember to get a memory card seperately. I didn't and now I have to wait again for that. I love the size and ease of this, and especially, because it's PINK! What more could a girl ask for?

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSCW120MDG/P 7.2 MP Digital Camera Review
Reviews.Author: Stanley L. Young
Reviews.Content: Shipment received in a timely manner. All items listed in the seller's description were received "new" as described.The photo submitted by the seller for this item contains a Memory Stick Pro Duo Card; however, there was not one included in the package I received. This was deceiving, and misleading. There was however, a USB Memory stick included in the package as pictured with the seller's description.The seller's description states a MSRW-MD1/P Memory Stick Duo Adaptor is included; however, there was not one included in the package I received. This is also deceiving. Otherwise - the camera and all other accesories were received new and in great working condition.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: Rulixx
Reviews.Content: I like the quality of the pictures taken in a low-light and additional features of the camera like "smile shutter", high ISO sensitivity, etc. Good camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony dscw 120 digital camera
Reviews.Author: Jason Norman "Alpa Jay"
Reviews.Content: Needed a good camera that would fit into a shirt pocket yet still take great pictures. This one fits the requirement perfectly. The only downside is that those of us with large or clumsy hands may have a little trouble using it (I have to use the lanyard to keep from dropping it) but it's the perfect size for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSC W120
Reviews.Author: J. Ross "JR"
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price. I feel the only drawback, it doesn't take AArechargable batteries. It is a separate battery pack. Other than that, agood deal.

Reviews.Title: Best of Cameras
Reviews.Author: Moneeka C. Mann "MO4myMann"
Reviews.Content: This is my second cybershot i've owned.. the DSC-W series i've found it the best.. i've had friends get the other one that doesn't have the W in it and its just not as nice and only a few bucks cheaper.. I just love the cybershot cameras!

Reviews.Title: The best digital camera I have owned.
Reviews.Author: Mary G.
Reviews.Content: Takes better photos than the last 2 Fujis I had, the S5200 and the Z10fd. The flash works very well indoors and the ISO setting actually lives up to the hype. I bought the S5200 a few years back because it was supposed the have a great natural light setting. Nope. This W120 is small, easy to use and takes great pictures. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: User Friendly
Reviews.Author: Michelle Haro "Michelle"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mom.  She has never owned a digital camera before and is not very technical.  I wanted to get a good point and shoot type camera that is good quality.  I am happy with the choice I made.  The camera is very slim, lightweight and I love the smile feature.  It really works!  My likes the camera also and has no problems using it.  The buttons and controls are a bit small though.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Burdette
Reviews.Content: This camera was for my wife.  What she was hoping for was a camera that took the shot immediately instead of waiting a couple seconds (very important for capturing moments).  It does this and also takes great sharp pictures every time with nice lighting and not too much contrast like her old camera had.  She has only used it for a couple days but so far she is extremely happy with it.  For the price it was a great deal!

Reviews.Title: He loved it..
Reviews.Author: S. Ortiz "beautyfreak6"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my boyfriend and he loves it. I have a pink one too. I really love it as well. Really good camera for a great price!

Reviews.Title: A great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: R. Taplin
Reviews.Content: As far as I am aware this is the best point and shoot on the market for this money. I have tried a lot of other point and shoot cameras - Canon, Nikon and Olympus - and the Cybershot is taking far better photos.For some good sentiments on this product check out this review:[...]

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSC120
Reviews.Author: Donald H. Smith
Reviews.Content: A very good buy. This camera is very versatile and for the amateur it has a lot of great features. I was tired of always taking blurry pictures and with the steady shot feature I have taken some great shots that are super clear. Definitely a great buy!!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Sara Hedrick
Reviews.Content: Very quality product. Takes great pictures. Has lots of setting for personal adjustments. The smile shutter is a fun tool. And I have even dropped it once and it held up great. Not even a scratch. Very durable.

Reviews.Title: Sweet little camera
Reviews.Author: Muneraven "muneraven"
Reviews.Content: I have had a Sony Cybershot for years and years and was waiting for that old one to break so I could get a new one but it never did break so I retired it and got this camera.  I love this thing!  So intuitive and easy to use!  My partner has a more expensive camera for fancier shots but I just wanted something quick and easy to use (I am a very casual photographer).  This is perfect for me.  It takes wonderful pictures, memory sticks and extra batteries are reasonably priced, and it is sturdy.  Also connecting it to my PC is so simple.  And it is pretty!I highly recommend this camera to folks who just want to snap some pictures of friends, family, pets, or scenery without too much trouble.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Bridget L. Williams
Reviews.Content: VERY easy to operate.  Catches pictures quickly with no delay.  Great for action shots!  With three kids all of my shots are action shots.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera! Small, powerful, long battery life, great photos
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Rossi
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera.  It takes great pictures, the battery lasts a long time, it takes great video, and it's tiny.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Pitrowski
Reviews.Content: A camera with alot of power to deliver great pictures and mini movies.  Easy to use. Comes with attachment that can display images in a TV screen. Lightweight, fits into pocket.Amazon made it easy to obtain product.  Quick delivery time.I am completely satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Sony camera
Reviews.Author: S. Braisted "purplecat"
Reviews.Content: A birthday gift for a grandaughter-  She loves it !!!Easy to use and a pretty pink color.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Deena Dawson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 8 year old daughter's birthday.  It is easy enough for her to use and takes great pictures.  I find myself using HER camera instead of my own due to it's better quality pictures.  I recommend this to anyone looking for a small, lightweight, convenient and quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, good price
Reviews.Author: A. R.
Reviews.Content: This camera has many functions, so many that I'm still not sure how to take advantage of them after a few months with it. All I can say is that a friend of mine who is an amateur photographer got a hold of it and took astonishing pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, easy to use!
Reviews.Author: PlayboyAmy28
Reviews.Content: I have to worst luck with cameras, but I've hit the jackpot here! I got this in pink from Best Buy a few days ago, and I'm absolutely in love! The size is perfect! This thing is sleek and small, but mighty powerful!! I was testing it, taking self pictures of my boyfriend and I, and when I took one picture, I moved the camera too quick to look at the picture, and expected to see a big blurr, but he and I were completely in focus! There was a little blurr on the wall behind us, but we were looking great!My favorite feature, is that whatever you do with this camera, like when you change the setting, it tells you what that setting should be used for, I likt that a lot!!! It helps you take the best pictures! I had wanted a DSC-780, but Best Buy didn't have it, so the guy reccomended this one, and knocked $10 off the price for not having what I origionally wanted, and I'm VERY happy! :)

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Christine Liguori "I'm in heaven"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my sony cybershot camera. I took so many beautiful pictures on my cruise.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: T. Hammer
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my 14 year old daughter.  It is very easy to use and takes great pictures!!  The quality of the zoom is very good.  Super camera for the price and comes in cool colors, great for teens.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSC-W120 7.2 MP
Reviews.Author: Barry Mosemann "Barry"
Reviews.Content: Great camera in small package.  I am not a prfessional so simple operation is a big plus.  Compared to old Nikon Coolpix, a breeze to operate and navigate.

Reviews.Title: Super sony
Reviews.Author: Scotty boy blue "gamer"
Reviews.Content: Sony stuff is great, I like that I can use my memory stick duo in my camera then in my psp and so on, This camera is high end and sleek, all of my friends want one now. I buy alot from Sony, i'm very pleased with all my purchases, a bravia xbr is next(I hope).

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCW120
Reviews.Author: K. Loder
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for a few weeks and am having fun learning about the many features.  The two most helpful to me are the Super Steady Shot and the large view screen.  It is very compact and well-made.  So far I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Delighted!
Reviews.Author: No1Lula
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a special gift for a dear friend who was more than delighted with its ease of use and great pictures this point and shoot had to offer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: H. Kilcoyne
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera right before my senior prom, and it really came through on a day where I wanted to take a lot of pictures. The battery lasted all night (and I took 2gb worth of pictures). My friends have other cameras in the same price range, with the same or higher megapixels, but Sony cameras take superior pictures. They adjust to bright light or a dark room better. I keep the anti red eye flash turned on, so no photoshop is necessary later.It's also worth mentioning that the video and microphone on this camera aren't bad. I've recorded a few concerts, where it's dark and there's a whole lot of background noise, and the videos turned out much clearer than I expected or hoped for.Plus, the camera is my favorite color, matches my iPod, and I get frequent compliments on it.

Reviews.Title: Second time same issues
Reviews.Author: WDC "Dub Cee"
Reviews.Content: For the price, the product is OK.  I bought the camera once prior to this (not from Amazon) and it lasted about a year each time.  I would be hesitant to recommend this camera to a friend.  It did work really well for a few months, but if you are looking for long term, I would look into other options.

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera!
Reviews.Author: BaZingaa
Reviews.Content: First of all, let me say this... I can't believe this camera has earned 136 5-Star reviews and 49 4-Star reviews. Also, I can't believe they are charging $250 for this piece of junk. I've had my camera for about 2 years.  I bought it to replace a Kodak Easy Share, which took awesome pics but had a serious battery problem.  This Sony takes great pics outdoors with lots of natural light.  Indoors is an entirely different story.  Lag time is excessive.  Blur is a common problem and many precious moments are lost due to this.  Many pics come out yellow AND blurry.  This is supposed to be a point-and-shoot camera.  There may be settings you can tweak to alleviate these issues, but if I wanted a manual camera, I would have bought one!  The battery life is way too short, therefore I had to purchase an additional battery for a back-up, so I would always have one fully charged and ready to go.  I don't like the memory stick... I prefer an SD card.  Like I said, I've had this camera for about 2 years and stopped taking pics for awhile because they were so crappy.  FINALLY, I broke down and bought a Nikon Coolpix S3000 12.0MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom Electronic Vibration Reduction (VR) and 2.7-Inch LCD for $110 and LOVE it. It has fast ISO of 3200, which is great for low-light and moving objects.  I wish I would have done myself a favor and upgraded the Sony much sooner.

Reviews.Title: For $109 dollars
Reviews.Author: B. Schick
Reviews.Content: Pixel is dead on display upon arrival.  Great little camera for cheap, so not a big deal if I lose or break it.  Sony is still stupid for using proprietary memory cards

Reviews.Title: CAPT AMERICA
Reviews.Author: Joe E. Sarsfield "CAPT AMERICA"
Reviews.Content: Find product at a good price. The reviews on this product were very helpful. Much better camera than the other more expensive name brand that I also have.

Reviews.Title: Great, Tiny, Powerful and Inexpensive
Reviews.Author: dugn
Reviews.Content: Plenty has already been said of this camera - and it's a great purchase.What I'd add is that it is very small - truly a pocket camera. It takes much better pictures than a digital camera only two years older.  It's quick on startup and very quick on trigger-to-shot speed.The entire camera is made much more intuitive by the visual explanations that appear on the display with each selection.  This helps translate those little-used symbols into something you can actually learn and put to good use (like the low light setting, or smile mode that may otherwise get overlooked for the life of the camera).The pictures taken with a flash are much improved over previous Sonys.  Whether its software, sensor or flash, I don't know.  But flash pictures are far more natural looking than previous models.  They're not over or under-saturated.In fact, this model is so intuitive and inexpensive, I sent one to a less-technical family member to replace an otherwise great Sony digital camera I recommended for them just 2 years earlier.  I even got one for my wife and now use it more than my own because of its features, slimness and quick shutter speed.Minor niggles: the otherwise simple and slim camera-to-USB cable has been replaced by a 'universal' cable that also includes video and audio plugs which makes the cable 3x thicker and more cumbersome than earlier models. Also - the rotating setting dial isn't indented far enough into the camera, so its easy to rub with your right hand when taking pictures which can bump the camera into another mode.Be sure to get a good memory stick like the Sony 2 GB Memory Stick PRO Duo (MSX-M2GS) (Retail Package) or the larger Sony 4 GB Memory Stick PRO DUO ( MSX-M4GS ) (Retail Package) both of which come with an adapter for card readers like the IOGear GFR281 56-in-1 Card Reader/Writer which is faster for transferring photos than a direct connection to the camera.I also opted for the Sony NP-FG1 InfoLITHIUM Type G Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery Pack for Sony W & H Series Digital Cameras battery that provides a 'time left' display in the camera - something the standard Sony NP-BG1 battery that comes with the camera does not.Least expensive highest quality camera I've seen for under $500.

Reviews.Title: I've searched for 8 months the search is finally over!!
Reviews.Author: Stephany Nicole Stokes "Stephany N Stokes"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for "The" perfect camera for about 8 months if not longer! I've wanted one for about 3 years and yesterday I finally made the purchase. I hate when cameras have a pause in between the click and the take. The pauses are normally so long that the moment you tried to capture is long gone. With the sony cybershot you click and you capture! That plus the beautifully clear image are what makes this camera great. I am a big breast cancer awareness supporter and the cybershot comes in pink! So for me it was perfect. I am also in the military and with the sony gps you can remember exactly where you take the picture. That is very neat being that I am going over seas soon. If you like slide shows which I do with music it's a great camera to have. It does just about anything you could want plus it has the smile feature, twilight, etc...ect..It's a great camera and I got it on sale!! 90$

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCW120/L 7.2MP Digital Camera (blue)
Reviews.Author: S. Zhao "ProAmateur"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter. She likes the color. The camera is small  and easy to carry around,  and it takes good pictures (not great pictures like a DSLR).  Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Raptor Man"
Reviews.Content: As usual very good value and great transaction. Used to capture my sons Championship season. Pictures are great and product is easy for novices to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase.  Excellent price, excellent camera. Very easy to use.  Compact, full sized display screen, picture perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband and it has become a family favorite. Easy to use and it produces beautiful images.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera Rocks!!
Reviews.Author: Ritz "Ritz"
Reviews.Content: This camera is worth the price, Battery is good and the quality of snaps as good as what we expect from Sony. In all, I am happy to buy this camera and enjoy photographing :-))

Reviews.Title: Sony Baloney
Reviews.Author: trigchance
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for only 4 months when the screen locked up and wouldn't function.  I spent 8 bucks to send it to the Sony repair center where they said that the malfunction was my fault and that the repair would cost me $90 bucks.  So the manufacturer's warranty is baloney, orSony Baloney.  Effectively, there is NO manufacturer's warranty, just in case you want to buy this camera.  Whatever goes wrong with your Sony camera is your fault, and they will NOT cover it.  Needless to say, I will never buy another Sony camera.  BUYER BEWARE!!!!  Any camera malfunction is your fault and will not be covered by the so-called manufacturer's warranty.  The manufacturer's warranty is strictly HYPE.

Reviews.Title: perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Gabriel E. Ortega V
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, elegant and easy for taking by its small size, it incorporates good functions, and great quality of image in the screen, the photos have good resolusion at night and also.

Reviews.Title: Cámara digital
Reviews.Author: Walter Vargas Navarro "Walter Vargas"
Reviews.Content: Es una cámara digital sumamente versátil, útil y pequeña, lo que facilita su acarreo y utilización. Es muy fina y de álta calidad.

Reviews.Title: the worst camera in the whole world
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo Azocar Hidalgo
Reviews.Content: the machine looks good, pictures are not bad, but if you are lucky it will works for 6 or maximum 12 months.They are so bad constructed in china they are so delicate.Never buy this machineprefer canon or whatever but never sony

Reviews.Title: Online ordering-great; product so-so
Reviews.Author: K. Tuck "just me"
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with Amazon.com's service.  However, less than a week after my son received his Christmas gift (the Sony Cybershot), it wasn't working and I had to send it off for repair.  My son tried every avenue available from Sony to fix it himself, to no avail.  As it's under warranty, the repairs will cost me nothing; however, I had to fork over $6.00 to print a UPS label for the return.  I am not a very happy Mom.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Karl Smith "Risk Manager"
Reviews.Content: Good product, not the best in cameras but excellent for a 10 years old girl. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Sauceda
Reviews.Content: Es una excelente camara. Tiene un tiempo de respuesta muy bueno despues de haber tomado fotos usando el flash.

Reviews.Title: Battery charger problems
Reviews.Author: J. Whiteside
Reviews.Content: The battery charger stopped working after a few months and the camera to pc connector cable is not a standard usb connection making a lost cable a serious problem.Based on lower than expected quality for the price, I would not recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Joyce E. Cureton
Reviews.Content: An excellent camera -- very easy for me to use without having to read directions -I don't like to read directions.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Marcel F. Gadea "SFMarcel"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It was very easy to understand the instructions and I like the quality of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: One year and 3 months out, my camera won't work
Reviews.Author: Susan_n_nm
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Sony Cybershot DSC-W120 camera 1 year, 3 months and 4 days ago.  Today when I tried to use it, it wouldn't turn on.  I took the battery in to see if it was bad and learned that it is a fully charged battery, no problems there.  When I turn on the camera, "sometimes" the view screen lights up for a few seconds but nothing else.  I checked to see what it would cost to repair my $100 purchase and the cost is $120.  Beware of this model as I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Yasser Sanchez "Hulky"
Reviews.Content: Esta camara es la mejor que e tenido! es lo mejor de lo mejor!It's The best camera I owned.

Reviews.Title: I do not like it.
Reviews.Author: H. Almubaid "sooo sooo"
Reviews.Content: I had this camera Sony DSCW 120 for about 4 months; and until now I do not know why sony has this big name. before it, I had a fuji camera and canon. the Fuji is 2MP and to me, it give much better photos that this 7MP sony.  I was surprised with the bad quality of the images of sony DSCW 120 when you view them on the computer.  My old Fuji camera (I think 7 years old) makes much better images.  Then only good images from Sony are those when you have plenty of light and sun and in this case any camera gives you very good image.  When you take pictures in-door with flash then the quality sinks. So, I rate sony one star out of five. I rate canon five stars.  I am planning to buy a Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot Digital Camera  7.2 MP
Reviews.Author: Suzanne G. Warner "Suzanne W."
Reviews.Content: Super price for this great an item- was a birthday gift to my 24 year old daughter.  Couldn't ask for better quality and price. Great customer satisfaction from dealer.  Thanks, Amazon and Vanns!!

Reviews.Title: Awful Camera, Lousy Pictures
Reviews.Author: Janyth
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my old worn-out Canon PowerShot A70 3.2MP camera thinking the pictures would be far superior.  Wrong.  The worst feature is the flash -- on most settings you cannot override and make the auto flash work if there is any light in the room... so all my indoor photos are way too dark.  I have had the camera a year and I hate it.  I do the bulletin board for a church group and all my photos of people are awful; they used to really be good with the old Canon.  The Sony Cybershot does take good pictures outside in bright light and the flash works well outside at night, but daytime indoor shots are the pits.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: R. S. Cotner
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace me DSC-W1.  It is a nice camera.  It fits into your pocket and purse really well.  But, it is lacking some of the features that the older models have.  It doesn't have the resize and trimming options.  If it had these features I would of given it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: sony
Reviews.Author: Alice R. Robbins "artz"
Reviews.Content: I saved about $80.00 And didn't even have to leave my leaving room.Came is only a few day's

Reviews.Title: i love my new cybershot
Reviews.Author: Irine Khechinashvili
Reviews.Content: i recieved it fast...it is the exact product described....i'm in love with my new cybershot...i had one before but this one is amazing

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Rony P. Rodas Ch "****ATILA*****"
Reviews.Content: La camara es muy buena tiene varias y funcionales caraceristicas, solo pienso q le falta un poco mas de zoom para hacerla toda una joya de la elctronica.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Camera!
Reviews.Author: Hilary Steinberg
Reviews.Content: I am completely pleased and excited to have  purchased this camera, the Sonyt Cybershot 120.  The transaction was great.  It arrived right on schedule in excellent condition, as promised.  I am really enjoying it and feel that I made a good choice, after a lot of research.

Reviews.Title: MY NEWEST AND FINAL CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: S. WILSON "SUSAN A*K*A CUPCAKE"
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS PERFECT! IT CAN MAKE ANY LIGHTING SCENE,FOCUS ON ANY SUBJECT OR FORM AND PLAY MUSIC DURING THE SLIDESHOW. PLUS YOU CAN ADD YOUR OWN SLIDESHOW MUSIC-WHAT CAMERA CAN DO THAT? THE PICTURES COME OUT CRYSTAL CLEAR AND BRIGHT OR EVEN BRIGHTER. I HAD A KODAK EASYSHARE C613 6.2 MEGAPIXEL CAMERA AND IT WAS GOOD BUT I WANTED SOMETHING MORE ADVANCE. PLUS I WOULD TAKE A PICTURE AND IT WOULD TAKE THE PICTURE REALLY SLOW. SLOW ENOUGH TIL I SAID IT HAS TO BE A BETTER CAMERA THAT TAKES FASTER PICUTRES. SO I LOOKED AT ALL THE CAMERAS AND FELL IN LOVE WITH THIS CAMERA. I HAVE THE ROSE PINK COLOR AND IT IS CUTE. I WAS GOING TO GET THE BLACK BUT I LOVE PINK TOO. IT WORKS PERFECT. THANKS SONY!!!!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot 7.2mp
Reviews.Author: Kelly Alvarez
Reviews.Content: is an excellent camera with a good design and color, will recommend to the entire world, by its very economical price

Reviews.Title: Skimpy internal storage
Reviews.Author: JoeK "JoeK"
Reviews.Content: The internal storage of the Sony Cybershot DSCW120 is ridiculously small, and a "memory stick" must be purchased for an additional $30+ to provide a reasonable photographic capability. Though the internal storage is 15Mbytes, this translates into only 5 (five) actual images at the default resolution.  Perhaps this information is buried someplace in their product manuals.  It required a phone call to Sony for me to determine it.  Even my old Olympus point and shoot holds 96 images at its default resolutionI see no reason the fact that the camera's internal memory can only hold five images.  It is even more "curious" that this fact is not clearly stated  in Sony's product documentation.  Could this be just a marketing scheme to sell a memory stick "accessory""?

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Roberts
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  For the average photographer this all you will ever need.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift
Reviews.Author: Fabiana Staudinger
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift to my Mom. She is delighted and she never complained (yet). It's easy to use and work with. Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera..Sony is superb always
Reviews.Author: S. Nair
Reviews.Content: I am die hard fan of Sony camera ..This is the second camera from Sony and picture quality and camera looks adorable.I am very much happy on this product

Reviews.Title: Very Good product
Reviews.Author: Rafael Salas
Reviews.Content: The product is very good, the only fail is the battery.  Doesn`t last to much.

Reviews.Title: Downloading photos
Reviews.Author: Hula Girl 808
Reviews.Content: Am I using this camera inappropriately? I get a lot of blurry shots and when it appears on camera that I took a good photo, when I download it to my computer it has a grainy look.  My old Sony digital camera took way clearer and better pictures and this one is supposed to be a better model?  Which makes me wonder if I'm not using it correctly.  Can someone suggest anything?

Reviews.Title: bad placement of connection to computer!!
Reviews.Author: Musical Sunshine
Reviews.Content: I was excited after I pulled the camera out of the box, charged the battery and took a few pictures.  The indoor photos set for no flash, came out with much truer color on the display than those with the flash.  The video quality wasn't bad, but the zoom doesn't work when taking a video.Then I went to move the pictures to my computer, that's when I was disappointed.  The connection place is on the bottom of the camera.  That's not 100% bad, but it's not even covered!  I don't know about anyone else, but when I put the camera down I usually put it on the base.  I also use whatever's around as a tripod.  Being one who takes pictures outside and other places where dirt/dust are around I found this quite disappointing.  Unfortunately I felt that had to return it and start the camera search again.

Reviews.Title: E:91:01
Reviews.Author: J. hurtado
Reviews.Content: Recently I bought this camera, and two days later I found this error E:91:01 (The flash did not work since the begining),Now none knows what it is, and I am not living in USA any more, so now I'm looking for a Technical service to solve my problem. I'm really dissapointed on this product and I'm still trying to contact the seller to find out what can I do.The most incredible thing was that when I started to find out on the net about this problem and I could see that this problem has existed since before models. I'M TOO DISSAPOINTED ON THIS PRODUCT because this error

Reviews.Title: Great but came in a bigger box
Reviews.Author: Horacio Bustos
Reviews.Content: All goog, but the camera's and accesories came in a great box like PS3, too bigger.

Reviews.Title: SLOW TO SHIP
Reviews.Author: D. Gump "EMT"
Reviews.Content: I ORDERED THIS AND IT SAID IT WOULD ARRIVE ON A MONDAY AND IT WAS A GIFT AND IT DID NOT GET HERE TILL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON

Reviews.Title: why did you send me two camera's
Reviews.Author: Alice Ralston "ajar2000"
Reviews.Content: you called and said my amazon charge had expired so I gave you my visa.  i said i wanted it updated.  the next day you called to ask if i wanted my charge updated for the camera i had asked about.  ok.  then i got two cameras.  i had to pay 15.00 to return the second camera.i was very upset over this....

Reviews.Title: Date/Time stamp?
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Can anyone tell me if this model has the date/time stamp fuction?  I read that the newer Sony models don't have that option anymore (what a dumb decision from Sony!)...
